description: The number of minutes grace for which there are no charges generated.(Must be positive integer)
Determines whether system will use weekday or weekend rate in calculation of Billing (Y - Weekend Rates; else weekday rates)
Service Charge Rate that will be used for bill calculations as percentage(%). This Service Charge is generally goes directly to the attendant and is shown seperately on the bill.
For disabling Partial Payments(Y - To disable Partial Payment; Else enable Partial Payment)
All taxes included in price(Y-the price is inclusive of all taxes; else taxes add to price.)
Currency Symbol displayed before prices and revenue throughout the system
Set stock buffer during food order.(Must be positive integer)
